questions.question: What is the predominant color of the visible surface?
What appears to be the primary material of the product?
Describe the overall pattern or grain visible on the surface?
What secondary color accents the primary color in the design?

What kind of finish does the surface appear to possess?

What is the implied density suggested by the material's appearance?
Are the lines in the design perfectly straight and even?
